alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 12:30AM CDT until April 23 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1230 AM MDT. * At 1130 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles south of Tribune to 12 miles south of Coolidge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Hamilton County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
